alert.note: Alert for Lewis; Marion; Shelby (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 20 at 1:26PM CDT until April 20 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN SHELBY...MARION AND SOUTHEASTERN LEWIS COUNTIES... At 126 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Philadelphia, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Philadelphia around 130 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Maywood. This also includes Wakonda State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
